Extension.name: rxs_NavReset
Extension.initParam: Resets the managed navigation. The naviagtion xml is cached and any operation on navigation related items or slots or variants will not get affected till resetting it.

Extension.name: rxs_NavAutoSlot
Extension.initParam: Adds links to all navigation slots

Extension.name: rxs_NavTreeLink
Extension.initParam: Builds a variant which references the nav tree

Extension.name: rxs_NavFolderSelector
Extension.initParam: Selects a given folder id by pathname. Useful in assemblers of content types which need navigation, but are not in folders.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: pathname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: full path of the folder to select. Typically starts with //Sites

Extension.name: rxs_NavTreeSlotMarker
Extension.initParam: This exit is to be used along with the NavTreeLink extension for generation of a navigation tree for a specific navon. When this extensionprocesses subsequent to NavTreeLink, it will walk down the navtree and check the info-url for each "ancestor" node. If it determines that the navon has content in a specified slots, it will mark the navon element with a special attribute set to "yes" which can then be leveraged in XSLT processing.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: markerName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the attribute to create on appropriate navon elements

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Name of the slot for which the exit should check for content

Extension.name: rxs_NavFolderCache
Extension.initParam: Flushes an item out of the cache when it is added to or removed from a folder.

Extension.name: rxs_NavAddAttribute
Extension.initParam: Adds an attribute to the Navon nodes in a Managed Navigation tree.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: attributeName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the attribute to add

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: queryResource
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The query resource that returns the attribute, usually appname/queryresourcename

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: index
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The index of the column in the query resource, 1 based indexing

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: relativeLevelAttribute
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the relative level attribute. Optional.
